abstract: The goal is for the school, if approved by the Department of Education, to open to an estimated 400 students in September 2008.
snippet: The goal is for the school, if approved by the Department of Education, to open to an estimated 400 students in September 2008.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn has given the advertising industry prominent executives like Jerry Della Femina, Philip B. Dusenberry of BBDO, Michael I. Roth of the Interpublic Group of Companies and John D. Wren of the Omnicom Group. Now, the industry is hoping to return the favor.

headline.main: Brooklyn Could Get a High School for Marketers

abstract: Update: First Data has officially closed its $26 billion buyout by K.K.R. Michael D. Capellas, the former chief executive of Compaq, will replace Henry Duques as chairman and C.E.O., among other personnel changes.First Data appears to be right on time.
